General.Name: Hubei Mailyard Share Co Ltd
General.Description: Hubei Mailyard Share Co.,Ltd, together with its subsidiaries, engages in manufacture, processing, and sale of clothes, apparel, textiles, and accessories in China and internationally. It operates through Apparel and Textiles, Medical, and Other segments. The company is involved in the house leasing; investment in the hotels; manufacture of fine wool textile products and garments; sale of pharmaceuticals and medical devices; production and sale of steam, resale of water and electricity; and provision of medical and transportation services. It also exports its products. The company was founded in 1993 and is headquartered in Huangshi, China.
